authRequired: true --- Authentication required on this page !!!

Logout buttons

1. Regular button

This buttom is made by standard HTML tags:
<button class="btn btn-success" ng-controller="NgPassportBasicCtrl" ng-click="logout()">Logout</button>



2. ngDirective button - default template

This buttom is made by angular directive 'ngpassportLogout' with default template:
<ngpassport-logout>Logout</button>
Logout

<div class="btn btn-danger ngpassport-logout></div>



3. ngDirective button - custom template

This buttom is made by angular directive 'ngpassportLogout' with custom template which override default template:
<ngpassport-logout template-url="myBootstrapLogout">Logout</button>

Logout
